wikipedia_page.main: Sir Clive Martin Rose  (15 September 1921 – 17 April 2019) was a British diplomat.

response: * Sir Clive Rose GCMG (1921–2019), a British diplomat, retired to Lavenham
Rose married Lois née Garton in 1920 and they had four sons, one of whom, Clive Rose, was a diplomat who served as Permanent Representative to the North Atlantic Council.

link_mentions.page: List of permanent representatives of the United Kingdom to NATO

response: *Sir Clive Rose, KCMG, United Kingdom Permanent Representative on the North Atlantic Council.
*Sir Clive Rose, 97, British diplomat.Sir Clive Rose G.C.M.G.
